Type.BattleDialog: Ohohoho! The show is about to begin~
Now, now! I want endless laughters and clapping to be heard and bird!
A round of applause… for the clowns who joined us for tonight’s show!
The spotlight was mine…
M-my goodness… Our crew member…
WHY MUST YOU TORMENT US INNOCENT BEINGS WHO ONLY WISHED TO BRING LAUGHTER!!!
Eee! It looks like one of your clowns was having toooo much fun there!
It’s so entertaining you want to roll on the floor, wouldn’t you say?
I knew it! My show can make anyone and everyone laugh.
Let us sing louder for them! And a one and a two…
It’s okay. Just do what we’ve been doing. You know what to do, right?
…Good work, everybody. Let’s clean up and wait for the others.
…No. I’m sure we’ll make it through.
It’s too soon to give up!
If we trust in each other and proceed, there will surely be a breakthrough…
I won’t let you have it your way anymore…
We’ve got to keep it together. There’s still hope!
I know this is a tough one, but let’s try and push on a little bit harder!
I’m doing fine on my end… Keep your concerns for yourselves!
Not bad. Are you all exhausted yet?
You aren’t terrified already, are you?
Hmm… I suppose the others are pulling their own weight, yeah?
Sorry… I’m at my limit…
You can leave the rest to me.
That’s not going to break me.
…Guess I should buckle down!
Got done on this end~
They are tricky… but interesting.
Is everyone doing okay?
We have to do this… I suppose.
Thank goodness we got this done. Right?
I thought I could do more…
At times like this… I’ve got to stay coolheaded.
Their behavior is just as gross as their looks…
How are the others? Can you all hold out for long?
I feel like a clown, too. Maybe even the entire circus.
I’m doing my part.
That singing voice is still ringing in my head…
It feels as if we’re in a circus…
A performance that gives laughter, huh…
It’s like… I was played by those clowns…
There has to be a better way…
I’m a little nervous… but I’ll fight in your stead.
I guess we shouldn’t take them for easy targets.
That’s one down. Let’s keep going!
It’s like… they’re doing a performance of some sort.
They look creepy, sort of…
They look similar to the two and those animals we received some time ago.
Ms. Tiphereth. Shall we head back?
Let’s not get reckless and make things worse.
…We can still do it.
It’s going to be over soon… Hang in there.
I’m not a fan of shows that are too loud.
That clown sure likes to run his mouth…
I’m not playing along with your silly act.
